required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Efficacy and Safety of Mirikizumab in Participants With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis (LUCENT 3)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-Label Extension Study to Evaluate the Long Term Efficacy and Safety of Mirikizumab in Patients With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis LUCENT 3

brief_summary.textblock: This study designed to evaluate the long-term efficacy and safety of mirikizumab in participants with moderately to severely active ulcerative colitis (UC).

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants in Clinical Remission
primary_outcome.description: Clinical remission based on the modified Mayo Score (MMS).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants in Endoscopic Remission
secondary_outcome.description: Endoscopic remission based on the MMS Endoscopic Subscores (ES).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants in Corticosteroid-free Remission
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants in corticosteroid-free remission.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Mucosal Healing at Week 52
secondary_outcome.description: Mucosal healing based on a histologic disease activity index.

secondary_outcome.measure: Health Related Quality of Life: Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire (IBDQ) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Health Related Quality of Life based on IBDQ score.
UC symptoms based on numeric rating score.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who are Hospitalized Due to UC
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who are hospitalized due to UC.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Undergo UC Surgeries Including Colectomy
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who undergo UC surgeries including colectomy.

criteria.textblock:
- Inclusion Criteria
- Participants from Study AMAC (NCT02589665) or AMBG (NCT #:TBD) who have had at least one study drug administration and have not had early termination of study drug.
- Female participants must agree to contraception requirements.
- Exclusion Criteria
- Participants must not have developed a new condition, including cancer in the originator study.
- Participants must not have any important infections including, but not limited to, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, HIV/AIDS, and active tuberculosis (TB) during either originator study
- Participants may not have received surgery for UC in the originator study or are likely to require surgery for treatment of UC during the study.
- Participants must not have developed adenomatous polyps during the originator study that have not been removed prior to the start of this study.

patient_data.ipd_description: Lilly provides access to the individual patient data from studies on approved medicines and indications as defined by the sponsor specific information on ClinicalStudyDataRequest.com. This access is provided in a timely fashion after the primary publication is accepted. Researchers need to have an approved research proposal submitted through ClinicalStudyDataRequest.com. Access to the data will be provided in a secure data sharing environment after signing a data sharing agreement.
